Jane is 12 years old. She is from Canada. Xia Yu is 13 years old. He is from China. They are good _ . They are in different _ . Jane is in Class One, Grade Seven. Xia Yu is in Class Two, Grade Seven. They have breakfast at home _ the morning. They often _ to school together.
Jane likes Chinese very much, _ she can't speak Chinese well. She has _
